snippet: In this clever short, which played during the just-completed art caravan, the artist Thomas Demand pulls off a visual trick that makes references to the origins of cinema.
abstract: In this clever short, which played during the just-completed art caravan, the artist Thomas Demand pulls off a visual trick that makes references to the origins of cinema.

headline.main: Now Screening | A Train Film to Celebrate Doug Aitken's 'Station to Station' Tour
